sect1.title: The model
sect1.para: &argo; contains one model that your can examine and modify. In the file menu you can store the model or open another model instead.

sect1.title: The window
sect1.para: The upper left part of &argo; lists the diagrams and objects of the model in one of several views.
The upper right part of &argo; shows one diagram at the time.
The lower right part you contains various details of various objects of the model. You select the object in one of the upper levels and choose what details you want to examine using the tabs.
The lower left part contains a list of all ToDo items for this model.

sect1.title: Commands
sect1.para: Commands are available from the menus and by right-clicking on the objects either in the list of objects or in the diagram. The commands available from the objects work on these objects.
Some commands for creating and drawing are available from the icon bars over the diagrams.
